scripts.generate:vpcapp:diagram: mkdir -p drawio-assets && cfn-dia draw.io -t sceptre/templates/application_vpc.yaml -c -o drawio-assets/application_vpc.drawio
scripts.generate:vpcsecurity:diagram: mkdir -p drawio-assets && cfn-dia draw.io -t sceptre/templates/security_vpc.yaml -c -o drawio-assets/security_vpc.drawio
